Service Details: - Raises funds to assist vulnerable women and children of Africa affected by the HIV/AIDS pandemic- Sells of a variety of handmade designer bags with 100% of the profits going directly to improve women’s lives through micro-loans, feeding programs, housing, sponsorship for school children, health and education issues
